Class Utils

java.lang.Object
  com.sun.tools.visualvm.core.datasupport.Utils

public final class Utils
extends java.lang.Object

Utils class encapsulating various helper methods.

Author:
Jiri Sedlacek

containsSubclass

public static <X,Y> boolean containsSubclass(java.util.Set<? extends java.lang.Class<? extends Y>> classes,
                                             X superclassInstance)
Returns true if given set contains at least one subclass of provided instance.

Type Parameters:
X -
Y -
Parameters:
classes - Set of classes that will be searched.
superclassInstance - instance to be searched.
Returns:
true if given set contains at least one subclass of provided instance, false otherwise.

getSortedDataSources

public static <X extends DataSource> java.util.List<X> getSortedDataSources(java.util.Set<X> dataSources)
Returns list of given DataSources sorted by distance from DataSource.ROOT.

Type Parameters:
X - any DataSource.
Parameters:
dataSources - DataSources to be sorted.
Returns:
list of given DataSources sorted by distance from DataSource.ROOT.

areDataSourcesIndependent

public static <X extends DataSource> boolean areDataSourcesIndependent(java.util.Set<X> dataSources)
Returns true if provided DataSources are independent. Independent means that no DataSource is (super)owner of any other DataSource.

Type Parameters:
X - any DataSource.
Parameters:
dataSources - DataSources to be checked.
Returns:
true if provided DataSources are independent, false otherwise.

getIndependentDataSources

public static <X extends DataSource> java.util.Set<X> getIndependentDataSources(java.util.Set<X> dataSources)
Returns Set of independent DataSources. Independent means that no DataSource is (super)owner of any other DataSource - this means that (sub)childs are removed.

Type Parameters:
X - any DataSource.
Parameters:
dataSources - DataSources to be filtered.
Returns:
Set of independent DataSources.

Returns filename without extension.

Returns:
filename without extension.

Returns:
file extension.

getUniqueFile

public static java.io.File getUniqueFile(java.io.File directory,
                                         java.lang.String file)
Returns new File in provided directory based on the given filename. NOTE: the query is synchronized, however creating a new file has to be synchronized in custom code

Parameters:
directory - directory in which to create the file.
file - preferred filename.
Returns:
new File in provided directory based on the given filename.

getUniqueFile

public static java.io.File getUniqueFile(java.io.File directory,
                                         java.lang.String fileName,
                                         java.lang.String fileExt)
Returns new File in provided directory based on the given filename. NOTE: the query is synchronized, however creating a new file has to be synchronized in custom code

Parameters:
directory - directory in which to create the file.
fileName - file name.
fileExt - file extension.
Returns:
new File in provided directory based on the given filename.

prepareDirectory

public static boolean prepareDirectory(java.io.File directory)
Tries to create the directory incl. all super directories, returns true if at the end of the operation the directory exists.

Parameters:
directory - directory to be created.
Returns:
true if the directory exists, false otherwise.

copyFile

public static boolean copyFile(java.io.File file,
                               java.io.File copy)
Copies source file to the destination file, returns true if the file was successfuly copied.

Parameters:
file - source file.
copy - destination file.
Returns:
true if the file was successfuly copied, false otherwise.

delete

public static boolean delete(java.io.File file,
                             boolean deleteOnExit)
Deletes file or folder. Optionally invokes deleteOnExit if necessary.

Parameters:
file - file or folder to be deleted.
deleteOnExit - true if deleteOnExit should be invoked on not deleted file or directory.
Returns:
true if the file or folder has been completely deleted, false otherwise.

createArchive

public static void createArchive(java.io.File directory,
                                 java.io.File archive)
Creates a zip archive of the given directory. Currently doesn't support archiving subdirectories (only files are added to the archive).

Parameters:
directory - directory to be archived.
archive - archive file.

extractArchive

public static java.io.File extractArchive(java.io.File archive,
                                          java.io.File destination)
Extracts given zip archive, returns extracted directory. Currently doesn't support extracting subdirectories, (only extracts toplevel files).

Parameters:
archive - archive to be extracted.
destination - destination directory.
Returns:
extracted directory or null if extracting the archive failed.

encodePassword

public static java.lang.String encodePassword(java.lang.String value)
Encodes given string using the Base64 encoding.

Parameters:
value - String to be encoded.
Returns:
encoded String.

decodePassword

public static java.lang.String decodePassword(java.lang.String value)
Decodes given string using the Base64 enconding.

Parameters:
value - String to be decoded.
Returns:
decoded String.

imageToString

public static java.lang.String imageToString(java.awt.Image image,
                                             java.lang.String format)
Encodes given image to String using the Base64 encoding. This is primarily intended to store small images (icons) in text (properties) files, no compression algorithms are used.

Parameters:
image - Image to be encoded.
format - image format.
Returns:
String containing the encoded image.

stringToImage

public static java.awt.Image stringToImage(java.lang.String string)
Decodes an image encoded by imageToString(Image, String) method.

Parameters:
string - String to be decoded.
Returns:
decoded Image.
